Frame.Nav: A mechanical tailgate allows for additional payload capacity of up to 59,525 lbs. (27 000 kg).
The auto-lube system continuously greases all lubrication points through a central distribution block, greatly reducing daily maintenance requirements and increasing machine reliability.
Hydraulic, flip-forward hood provides easy access to maintenance points, engine, valves and pumps.
New lighting package with lamps in bumper and at top of cab provides direct illumination of the job site.
A long, sloping hood gives the operator improved all-around job site visibility.
Heated, remotely controlled side mirrors are optional equipment on the 330 ADT.
Swing-out fenders on both sides of the truck offer high level of accessibility to maintenance/service zones.
A sliding cab window improves operator comfort through additional ventilation.

Longitudinal difflock permits operation of the vehicle in four- or six-wheel drive for safe, efficient operation in changing terrain and driving conditions. Vehicle is in two-wheel drive when difflock is not engaged.
A sharp skow angle lets material discharge easily from the load body.

A spacious cab is designed for operator comfort and ease of use with ergonomically designed controls positioned within the operator's easy reach, status lights readily visible, an adjustable steering console and a suspension seat that adjusts to the operator. Air conditioning is standard.
Pressure test ports conveniently are grouped together and are easy to reach for quicker, more accurate diagnostic checks.
Steps to the cab are designed with easy entry/exit in mind.
Limited-slip axles deliver power to where itâ€™s needed most, from the wheel that is slipping to the wheel that is gripping.
Case articulated dump trucks retain a wide frame and lower dump body, which creates a lower center of gravity and exceptional stability.
For added safety and enhanced productivity, an optional closed-circuit camera and monitor lets the operator clearly see objects behind the vehicle.
Vehicle moves easily over rough terrain with axle oscillation.
The tandem walking beam is mounted directly off the frame for added strength and durability.
A dual-element air filter screens out more dust and debris. The filter can be replaced from ground level.
Housing the dump cylinders inside the truck's frame gives added stability to the vehicle and better protects the cylinders from the elements than if they were mounted outside the frame.
Dual roller carrier bearings in the oscillation joint provide extended life and reliability.

Tier 2 certified engine delivers net 300 hp (224 kW) with reduced emissions and greater performance and efficiency. With charged air-to-air engine cooling, air entering the intake manifold is cooler. Because cool air is denser than warm air, more air enters the combustion chamber, providing a more efficient and cleaner burn.
